post.body: Oh how exciting - yes definately I will tell you as soon as they arrive, can't wait to see them ;)
yes definately 20% off anything for you hun!
I will check it out and get back to you - if I don't because I am a busy mumma of four! twitter me back!
Thank you so much :)
Ooo well tell your complimenters to mention your name to get a discount! *cheeky me*
Oooo now there is a good idea! - I shall do that - might help 'declutter' the look of my store too - thanks so much!
ohhhh now I know who you are ;)
yes I am up for trading - have done a bit of this and it has all worked well :) - have you some ideas?
yes purple banners it is - will have to make some and try and resist using them myself!
thanks for taking the time to look and comment :)
yes it is too pink for me too *I adore purple things* but I am sure a pink person will love it!
Go DUST team!
I looked.. the lil growls got my heart racing - my brother was mauled by two big dogs when we were children and I saved him...
I would look but I have a fear of big dogs :) I am sure he is lovely though.
eww... goobers
hrmm I have been meaning to ask you about your earring hook making....
ahh much better - I need all the praise I can get! hehe *cheeky me*
Thank you for taking the time to comment :)
Woohoo - glad I am not the only one that likes my interpretation of funky - I like your nice green avatar btw
Yayyyy - just right for my store then!!!
I always use photoshop to make banners... for my own AND the ones I have listed for sale... hey you didnt tell me you love it!
thank you so much for checking it out and so quickly too!!!
I think yogabbagabba is made to drive parents insane!
lol I sound so superficial! But I did just sit for45 mins having them done.... and it was a hand painted christmas tree!!!
well I had a full on day but happy to be home now even if I did wreck my newly painted nails :(!!!!
Hey how are you? *fellow duster*
Woohoo I am not the only one - maybe we need coffee?
Oh good I am glad It is just not me *was going to show off that I actually remembered your name but its not the place!*
wow well theres a good idea! thanks for passing that one on
hrmm not crashing.... just flying! --- back to purple now...and the beads...
hrmmm sorry no pills, only beads!
Thank you very much for taking the time to check it out for me :)
Oh purple can never be painful! ;)
ahhh the beads?
I watched a docco about grizzly's wandering the streets of America.. now THAT would be scary!
yeah lots of kangaroo 'pellets' everywhere! ;)
Oh I have eaten plenty of McDonalds! I am afraid there isn't a koala in every gumtree and a kangaroo hoping down each street
Guess what... I have never patted a Koala... and I was born and raised here... I have only ever seen one in the wild once too
Green :) - in a slight subtle way.
hehe... hope youre having a fantastic day though! :)
Oh goodness no... and I am not sure that Aussies are supposed to stand to the Star Spangled Banner?
yes please I have to run too - send me that file
oh no worries - I will just send you a paypal invoice?
sounds like a great idea - promo any way that you can!
Yes me too :) - one has already sold so far... *crosses fingers* must go to bed now - chat again soon !!! good luck with sales
Yeah I think everyone should GetFunked! www.etsy.com/getfunked
Hey there - I have replied hun :)
- sounds tasty - yum! (not so healthy though!!!)
thats cute! - geeky is cool isnt it?
and how much would those lovelies set me back *I like*
sorry... don't quite know what you mean... did I offend you?
yeah its got to!!! *just trying to get three little girls ready to go out to a presentation and its proving difficult!*
yes customers always love discounts - but not when you up the price - -- so good idea!
My sunday was good, monday on the other hand... lets just say I hope you have a better one!
Gorgeous pottery work :) I would love to buy some but the postage makes it way out of my price range!!! Great sun bowl though
That is a very kewl bowl - I have no idea how much something like that would be priced?!?
Oh me too... same goes... I find german people very interesting, their honesty is so brutal but teaches me to be thick skinned!
see with an upbringing like that melted cheese with corn chips on a roll is tame!! haha
now thats a nice piece of onyx :) - love the interesting first shot too, good attention grabber.
well sometimes the most interesting mixes are the tastiest!
can you clean mine too! *cringes* - oh and while youre at it, the bathroom too ;) hehe
You put the chips on the roll too? - Go the carbs!
those seahorses are swingin'! - very blue and cute indeedy!
nice earrings - would like to see a few shots of these - different angles & different lighting so you can see the raised patterns.
hold on, aren't all pornos romantic? hrmm they are definately comedic!
I am glad you got to peek at my banner :) It should all be working now, thanks for looking!
what is twitip?
do you mean you have got the pics?
Yeah its all practice and fun! Did you see this - http://tinyurl.com/5nxdex *show off!*
I don't know... I am actually really worried, I can't get in contact with the lady and the hospital says she hasn't come in
I have cleared up the grainy look to it as well - I have sent a big one 760x760p and an avatar size one 75x75p
Oh what size do you want your avatar?
Meh its ok - I 'stole' it from your listing and I am working my magic ;)
What sort of translation are you talking about?
meh - I am cropping it for myself :P
Oh really... I think I did it over 20 times yesterday! Meh love the lil things that bring me happiness! haha
Yes miss independant... it looks better... but send it to me and let me have a go - it was my idea! Then you can use ur own still!
ahh good... I am not the only twit then :P
lol - your poor boyfriend - hrmm you know theyre meant for us girlies to enjoy?? ;)
Eep the Devil - he always calls you to see your dark parts and where you can lighten them up - bring on the transformation!!
my brain is going in 50x speed tonight! *crazy woman on a creative mission!*
Yeah send me a convo (via etsy) with a copy of the pic and I will 'zap' it in photoshop :P
Ahh I am just catching up with custom banners :) btw can I lighten the back of that avatar of yours (no charge)?
Obviously one who didnt have children of their own I bet!
Meh... I slept on the lounge a bit... !
Yes well... I made one suncatcher... but got bored, then I made a necklace and four pairs of earrings!
No! - you did!
Oh yum! That sounds so tasty - did you have a bit of sweet chilli in your peanut sauce? *I make a killer peanut sauce!*
I wonder what a total Zen Master looks like.....
Yes a constant firm push is sometimes just what you need :)
too many things that must be done in the next 24 hours - must work fast!
mmm that was good... but this is what I need http://tinyurl.com/6em9vt
I just really want some more hours in the day today...
'do you really want to make me cry'
Yes slow and steady wins the race right? *builds up the pace*
You and boy George can go it alone tonight, I am in like Flynn with Placebo!
You make the yummiest beads!
No plasticine is oil based and you cannot make it at home - its not friendly stuff... I loathe it.
Ahh you dont celebrate Christmas?
hrmm I guess there just isnt as much money to go around... :(
Theyre sterling wire seems to be a good price too *trying to get her head around all the conversions!*
I also think everyone is broke and waiting for the after christmas sales...
hrmm not really - there are only a couple of weeks to go... lots of christmas parties going on here...
That person must be a real animal lover ;)
free gifts are always good :)
Too early for what ??
sounds great - not sure if the shipping to Australia would cancel out any savings for me though but I will check it out
that site looks great!
Maybe people are getting ready for Christmas?
Hey youre the one that is telling me its hot and steamy at your place!
Lol the James Bond movie!!!! - later its was fireworks haha!
You all organised for tomorrow?
Yes I did actually - even though I saw the James Bond movie... it was punch, bang, boom and over!
Thank you!
Love that big snowladen tree you have at the top of your page :)
This is true, the more you post the more you get replied to I guess :)
Yay! The weather is clearing up outside huh...
Hrmm... what do you mean by safe?
good luck with your doctors and insurance :) - I think you should just take it as tomorrow for you too :)
thats such a cute puppy - I am sure it wont stay at your place too long :)
Thank you for telling me that interesting info :) - #1 - that is very cool!
Kewl buttons :) - you should make some stud earrings a bit like that... would be really different and cute too!
yes its amazing how each year seems to go faster than the last - things must really go past in a blink when your 90!
well, at least you know why ;) Remember you are happier when your thoughts support your feelings - think well to feel good!
Sounds like a good birthdate to me :)
Of course, Virgo is done now, sorry for the delay - I didn't forget you ;)
Taurus is done now :)
yes it seems like Libra (as usual) is finding the social side of life alot of fun ;)
Oh dinner was good - everything was delish - thank you for asking :)
Impatience, impatience... see yours now?
Gorgeous store - sure is glam! Your style is just beautiful - something in there for everyone :)
I must go = visitors - chat soon!
Oh gee i wish you luck - weaving is so not my thing haha! - think I could do about 10 lines.. then it would stay unfinished!
Ooo I have spurred you onto bead - yay!
Which one is your fave?
Oh thank you :) - gotta love the fireworks as the clock strikes :)
Oh you will be able to do some extremely serious bead work with what I will send you! Gee I am even excited for you!
Oh I will just have to send you a bit of everything then! How long have you been beading?
I feel that you a lovely person who shares my love of beads :) Could you use some glass beads too?
I picked up a partial hank of vintage czech seedies in a teal colour -I am sure you could make something beautiful with them
I would like to send you a bead package in the new year as a belated christmas present - convo me your addy in etsy please!
hrmm but I am a bead addict and sometimes I just cant wait - shh dont tell hehe
No one has answered - how embarressing! http://tinyurl.com/5mexxu
Capture your customers with an eyecatching BULLSEYE! http://tinyurl.com/5z8dvs
I have a new listing http://tinyurl.com/5ohgzn tell me what you think?
I guess also because dobermans are usually seen as fierce guard dogs only... but I bet he is a softy and a protector too :)
I FINALLY made myself a new banner - give me your opinion? www.getfunked.etsy.com - thanks in advance!
my new christmas tree painted nail just became a smudge :( and it looked so pretty too!
Phew - finally back home again - what a day!
wow I am having a hard time waking up today!
Well... its definately purple! http://twitter.com/getfunked
Woo hoo - I prettied my Twitter - tell me what you think? - is it purple enough do you think ;)
phew - its my first time sitting down all day!
Oh and while I am asleep go buy something from my store would you ;) www.getfunked.etsy.com
I am off to bed right now but I will wake up and design some killer twitter pages and make some TWITTER PRETTY!!!
Ok, on that note, I am going to go retry to get some sleep!!! - its 1:30am here!
Look at my cute lil shop www.getfunked.etsy.com
hrmm I cant sleep...
Good night (for me) all!!!!!
Ok I need some beauty sleep.... tired...
Are you bored with your Twitter Background yet? http://tinyurl.com/5nxdex
Want me to make a twitter background for you for FREE? http://tinyurl.com/6cy28q
Aussie, Aussie, Aussie!!!
I can't believe that first listing sold within seconds of me listing it! - Seems like lots of people want a Unique Twitter Background :)
Want a pretty twitter? http://tinyurl.com/5nxdex http://tinyurl.com/6za3zw
Want a unique Twitter background? http://tinyurl.com/5ljmaa
I am currently making a listing for my photoshop custom twitter home pages... yay!
I had a great day at the markets today - nice and warm and sunny... and marketish!
Can you find my banner in this treasury? http://tinyurl.com/6f9fgq
I have to go to my sons presentation day today...
Wow its morning again at my place.
I have been thinking of making some sage smudge sticks - what do you think? *to sell in my store*
It 'don't' matter if its black or white! http://tinyurl.com/6x2p8e (newest listing)
Who else likes to get twooshes? *twits that are exactly 140 characters* - I somehow get a satisfaction on getting the exact amount by chance
Where are my fellow night owl twits??!??!?!
Feel like I am going to be having another late one tonight - working hard on banners and business card designs and my brain is wide awake!
My day is super busy but I am having a fantastic day! - how is yours going?
*times herself* - ten mins to make a suncatcher brb
I have finished all of my jewellery 'explanations' - whoo hoo... now onto making a few suncatchers and maybe one more necklace
brrr its just got cold here all of a sudden...
*stresses quietly*
Add some bling to your Twitter posts http://be-a-magpie.com/kgo9at
Etsy Banners, Tarot Readings, Jewellery, Beads and Findings: www.getfunked.etsy.com
Welcome to all my new twits - nice to have you in my list - will have to go and check out your sites :)
Add some bling to your Twitter posts http://be-a-magpie.com/kgo9at
Add some bling to your Twitter posts http://be-a-magpie.com/kgo9at
This one is selling like hotcakes! Relisted now: http://tinyurl.com/6xslua
Add some bling to your Twitter posts http://be-a-magpie.com/kgo9at
Phew - sorry a few distractions here... but the stars are finished~!!

Good things DO happen to good people.
Etsy New Years Banners http://tinyurl.com/6rcfpz only $4!!!
